content: my mom works with a group of ladies crocheting for charity occasionally i get blackmailed into writing patterns……… twiddle muffs are fabulous for dementia and alzheimer patients and also for children with autism my ouma granny in s a is now in a home with this awful disease so this one is for her **material list** - any dk yarn of your choice - 4mm hook - needle for sewing in ends - ribbon - buttons - pom poms - fluffy yarn - crochet motifs - charms and trinkets if you are working your twiddle muff in thicker yarn the pattern is worked in multiples of 4 and you can decrease your starting chain by 8 stitches to work a slightly smaller twiddle muff visit my facebook group for pattern support and other info https //www facebook com/groups/1370975902929963/
